followUpsPopup.description: Great news! You have been chosen as part of an exclusive group to try our new auto follow-up feature.
followUpsPopup.descriptionLine2: In just two clicks, you can schedule custom messages to be automatically sent to couples who donâ€™t respond to you, saving you valuable time and effort.
followUpsPopup.descriptionLine3: Any feedback on how we can improve this new feature, please email: alex.keenan@bridebook.co.uk
followUpsPopup.dontShowAgain.description: Just go to <1>Settings Â» Enquiry settings</1> and click "Create your first follow-up" under Follow-up messages section.

stage.columnDescription.booked.nonVenue: Leads are automatically moved here when a couple marks your business as booked.
stage.columnDescription.booked.venue: Leads are automatically moved here when a couple marks your venue as booked.
stage.columnDescription.lead.nonVenue: All new enquiries start here, unless the couple has already marked your business as booked.
stage.columnDescription.lead.venue: All new enquiries start here, unless the couple has already marked your venue as booked.
stage.columnDescription.lost.nonVenue: Mark a couple as Lost if you think they're unlikely to respond. If they later respond, they will be automatically moved back to Lead, so you always have visibility.
stage.columnDescription.lost.venue: Mark a couple as Lost if you think they're unlikely to respond. If they later respond, they will be automatically moved back to Lead, so you always have visibility.
status.notReplied.tip: You havenâ€™t replied to this couple yet. This state is automatically assigned when you open a lead without replying.
tableHeader.tooltip.idealDate: The ideal wedding date is often an early estimate given by couples during sign-up. As they explore their options, their preferences might shift.
tableHeader.tooltip.labels: Organise your leads with labels like Gold Package or Attended Open Day to track special attributes and key details. Bridebook will automatically apply Hot Lead when the couple shows high intent.
tableHeader.tooltip.lastMsg: Leads are sorted by the most recent message, whether from you to the couple, the couple to you, or a Bridebook system update.
tableHeader.tooltip.owner: Assign or update whoâ€™s responsible for each lead.
tableHeader.tooltip.stage: Use Stages to help you track where each lead is in their booking journey, whether theyâ€™re a new lead, qualified lead, scheduled for a meeting, or booked.
tableHeader.tooltip.status: Use Statuses to track the latest action taken for each lead, so you always know whatâ€™s been done and what needs attention next. Each status gets reset when the lead changes to a different stage.
